name: Ed Wolfer
description:
Hair:brown….Eyes: brown……Body type: About average…..Height: 5”8, I like most outdoor activities I.e. concerts, fairs, festivals,camping, BBQing, fishing. Indoor activities includes dinning out, slow dancing, good conversation, snuggling, playing footsie. I love growing and giving roses there is never a bad day to give a good rose.
My Kind of Music ..I basically love most music! R&B and BLUES and Christian music such as woman of faith and Roy Kennedy etc, I have been widow for a long time and am so glad when i saw yo awesome profile.I’m passionate about most aspects of my life, both personally and professionally. I love being a Christian but I also have many other interests.
